name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Elemental Robe
description: A mystical robe that channels the power of the elements.
looks: The robe is made of fine silk and shimmers with different elemental colors. It has intricate patterns and symbols representing the different elements.

special_effects.elemental_absorption: Absorbs a portion of elemental damage and converts it into mana.

name: Lightning Staff
description: A staff infused with the power of lightning.
looks: The staff is made of polished dark wood with intricate carvings. It crackles with electricity and has a glowing blue gem at the top.

special_effects.chain_lightning: Attacks have a chance to chain lightning to nearby enemies.

name: Staff of Thunder
description: A staff that harnesses the power of thunder and lightning.
looks: The staff is made of dark wood with lightning-like carvings along its length. At the top of the staff, there is a crystal orb that crackles with electricity.

special_effects.Thunderstrike: 25% chance to deal additional lightning damage upon successful hit

name: Ice Wand
description: A magical wand that harnesses the power of ice.
looks: The wand is made of transparent ice with intricate frost patterns. It emanates a cold aura and is cold to the touch.

special_effects.frostbite: Has a chance to freeze the target, causing them to take additional ice damage over time.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire and ice damage to attacks

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that can harness the energy of the elements.
looks: The staff has a long wooden handle adorned with intricate carvings representing the four basic elements: fire, water, air, and earth. The top of the staff has a crystal orb that glows with a faint shimmer.

special_weapon_skills.elemental_mastery: Increases the damage of elemental spells by 20%.
